name: Sail-By Salute
description:
SUMMARY

Sail-By Salute is a PSX horror game. The location (and something else...) of the game is inspired from Bioshock 1's Rapture, set in an abandoned underwater city. But one day the beloved giants of the city, the Builders gone mad, and everyone had to evacuate...

You arise in the middle of the sunken city, injured, looking for information on how you got there, and most importantly; a way out of the ocean!

Use your Freeze Crossbow and Hammer to smash your way out of the city! But be careful! There is still something lurking in the submerged buildings! CONTROLS

WASD - Move
C - Crouch
Left Mouse Button - Swing hammer
Right Mouse Button - Shoot crossbow
E - Interact
F - Flashlight
Tab - show current objective
Esc - Pause
Middle Mouse Button - Zoom

FEEDBACK & SUPPORT

Thank you for playing the game, it means a lot to me and I hope you enjoyed yourself!

If you encountered any bugs or glitches feel free to comment it down below!

If I forgot to credit you, please send a message or an e-mail to me and I'll put you in the credits tab! @bedtimedev

If you really really want to support me by any chance, you can take a look at my Ko-Fi page!
